item.name: Angelic Page
item.text: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: If only every message were as perfect as its messenger.

item.name: Ardent Militia
item.text: Vigilance
item.flavorText: Knights fight for honor and mercenaries fight for gold. The militia fights for hearth and home.

item.name: Blessed Reversal
item.text: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.
item.flavorText: "A battle's outcome is never certain." —The Southern Paladin

item.name: Breath of Life
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Nothing can stop the power of life—not even death." —Onean cleric

item.name: Castle
item.text: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
item.flavorText: ". . . Our castle's strength Will laugh a siege to scorn." —William Shakespeare, Macbeth

item.name: Circle of Protection: Black
item.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
item.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: Green
item.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: Red
item.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: White
item.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Cloudchaser Eagle
item.text: Flying When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
item.flavorText: Most eagles hunt small animals. The cloudchasers hunt magic.

item.name: Crossbow Infantry
item.text: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
item.flavorText: Twang. You're dead.

item.name: Disenchant
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.name: Eager Cadet
item.flavorText: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the ‘training' I needed."

item.name: Elite Archers
item.text: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
item.flavorText: They fletch their arrows with the feathers of angels.

item.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
item.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
item.flavorText: A picture is worth a thousand swords.

item.name: Glorious Anthem
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: "North and South meet and angels sing. Voices resound with a righteous ring." —"The Ballad of the Paladins"

item.name: Healing Salve
item.text: Choose one — Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

item.name: Heavy Ballista
item.text: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
item.flavorText: "Soldiers wear down and enemies collapse—but the ballista never tires." —Ballista captain

item.name: Holy Strength
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

item.name: Honor Guard
item.text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The strength of one. The courage of ten.

item.name: Intrepid Hero
item.text: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
item.flavorText: A fool knows no fear. A hero shows no fear.

item.name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
item.text: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.
item.flavorText: Honorable in battle, generous in death. —Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

item.name: Knight Errant
item.flavorText: Knights are quick to pledge their loyalty and even quicker to charge into battle.

item.name: Knighthood
item.text: Creatures you control have first strike.
item.flavorText: Kings don't make knights. Actions do.

item.name: Longbow Archer
item.text: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Some say they have the blood of hawks running through their veins.

item.name: Master Healer
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: Her heart holds the pain of every soldier she's ever healed.

item.name: Northern Paladin
item.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target black permanent.
item.flavorText: "How smooth his face, how sure his thoughts. I look forward to breaking his mighty will." —The Eastern Paladin

item.name: Pacifism
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
item.flavorText: Without warriors there can be no war.

item.name: Pariah
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
item.flavorText: A valiant knight's life has no meaning without honor.

item.name: Purify
item.text: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
item.flavorText: "We have no need for these trinkets. We need only the strength of our swords and the virtue of our hearts." —The Northern Paladin

item.name: Razorfoot Griffin
item.text: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: Like a meteor, it strikes from above without warning. Unlike a meteor, it then carries you off and eats you.

item.name: Reprisal
item.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Fear this no more"

item.name: Reverse Damage
item.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
item.flavorText: "Weapons usually bring death. Today, mine will bring life."

item.name: Rolling Stones
item.text: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.
item.flavorText: "We spent three weeks trying to knock that wall down. Now it's knocking us down." —Onean sergeant

item.name: Sacred Ground
item.text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The land will never betray those who gave their lives for it.

item.name: Sacred Nectar
item.text: You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "For he on honey-dew hath fed, And drunk the milk of Paradise." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

item.name: Samite Healer
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: Why does a Samite heal? You might as well ask why a bird flies.

item.name: Sanctimony
item.text: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."

item.name: Seasoned Marshal
item.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
item.flavorText: He reads the battlefield like a map, always seeking the shortest route to victory.

item.name: Serra Advocate
item.text: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: An angel's blessing prepares a soldier for war better than a thousand military drills.

item.name: Serra Angel
item.text: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
item.flavorText: Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.

item.name: Serra's Embrace
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.
item.flavorText: "With one breath, the newborn angel took to the air . . . and the world sighed." —The Book of Serra

item.name: Shield Wall
item.text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "If not for the wizard, we'd all be dead now. 'Course, it was him that started all this in the first place." —Onean veteran

item.name: Skyshroud Falcon
item.text: Flying, vigilance
item.flavorText: The earliest mystics believed that the falcon slit the sky to let the light break through.

item.name: Southern Paladin
item.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.
item.flavorText: "How can anyone fight so much yet enjoy it so little?" —The Western Paladin

item.name: Spirit Link
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: The noble paladins draw strength from the courage of others.

item.name: Standing Troops
item.text: Vigilance
item.flavorText: They fight so closely together a mouse couldn't slip past their guard.

item.name: Starlight
item.text: You gain 3 life for each black creature target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: "Even in the darkest night Stars and angels still shine bright." —Onean children's rhyme

item.name: Staunch Defenders
item.text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "The key to winning any fight is simply staying alive." —The Southern Paladin

item.name: Sunweb
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
item.flavorText: Sometimes the wings of fallen dragons refuse to give up the sky.

item.name: Sustainer of the Realm
item.text: Flying Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

item.name: Venerable Monk
item.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "I rely not so much on the wisdom of age as on the overconfidence of youth."

item.name: Vengeance
item.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: "It is the duty of the strong to oppose any who threaten the weak." —The Southern Paladin

item.name: Wall of Swords
item.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

item.name: Worship
item.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
item.flavorText: "Believe in the ideal, not the idol." —Serra

item.name: Wrath of God
item.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Air Elemental
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Where psycho meets cyclone.

item.name: Ancestral Memories
item.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
item.flavorText: "It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards." —Lewis Carroll, Through the Looking Glass

item.name: Arcane Laboratory
item.text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
item.flavorText: Too many wizards spoil the spell, but too many spells spoil the wizard. —Sign on entry to arcane lab

item.name: Archivist
item.text: {T}: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Knowledge is a feast for the mind. Savor every swallow."

item.name: Baleful Stare
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.
item.flavorText: He can drown you in his eyes.

item.name: Benthic Behemoth
item.text: Islandwalk
item.flavorText: The sea has many secrets, but some are too big to be kept.

item.name: Boomerang
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Returne from whence ye came. . . ." —Edmund Spenser, The Faerie Queene

item.name: Confiscate
item.text: Enchant permanent (Target a permanent as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that permanent.) You control enchanted permanent.
item.flavorText: "The surface world contains nothing I cannot take." —The Lord of Atlantis

item.name: Coral Merfolk
item.flavorText: The coral merfolk delight in wrestling with their foes, skinning them alive on the razor-sharp edges of their reef.

item.name: Counterspell
item.text: Counter target spell.

item.name: Daring Apprentice
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.
item.flavorText: "I've seen my master do this a hundred times. How hard can it be?"

item.name: Deflection
item.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
item.flavorText: "You've thrown your net at the wrong fish." —The Lord of Atlantis

item.name: Delusions of Mediocrity
item.text: When Delusions of Mediocrity enters the battlefield, you gain 10 life. When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves the battlefield, you lose 10 life.
item.flavorText: When nothing but second best will do.

item.name: Equilibrium
item.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Seek balance in all things—as long as the scales are weighted in your favor. —Vodalian saying

item.name: Evacuation
item.text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: "How many people can you save in that thing?" "All of them," replied the mage with a smile.

item.name: Fighting Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Scholars in their ivory towers call them "sharks of the sky." Scholars on the road don't call them at all.

item.name: Fleeting Image
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "It was as if we fought a shadow." —Onean soldier

item.name: Flight
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

item.name: Force Spike
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
item.flavorText: "I don't think so."

item.name: Giant Octopus
item.flavorText: The only thing that flows faster than water is fear.

item.name: Glacial Wall
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
item.flavorText: Like arguing with ice —Vodalian expression meaning "wasting your time"

item.name: Hibernation
item.text: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: The deep sleep of winter is not always restful.

item.name: Horned Turtle
item.flavorText: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

item.name: Inspiration
item.text: Target player draws two cards.

item.name: Levitation
item.text: Creatures you control have flying.
item.flavorText: "We'll be easy targets if we remain on the ground. Let's take the fight to them."

item.name: Lord of Atlantis
item.text: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
item.flavorText: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

item.name: Mahamoti Djinn
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

item.name: Mana Breach
item.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: The mana that binds the world together can also tear it apart.

item.name: Mana Short
item.text: Tap all lands target player controls and empty his or her mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Remove their power, and their will to fight will follow." —Tolarian wizard

item.name: Mawcor
item.text:
Flying
{T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Neither head holds a brain—that's located somewhere in the chest—but four eyes aim much better than two.

item.name: Memory Lapse
item.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Eri phar phesta . . . um, phistor . . . er, phistara . . ."

item.name: Merfolk Looter
item.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
item.flavorText: When you sink a lot of ships, it's easy to find sunken treasure.

item.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
item.flavorText: "The paladins would be wise not to forget about the Pearl Trident. The merfolk warriors have turned the tide of more than one human war . . . and I have no doubt they shall do so again." —Onean scholar

item.name: Opportunity
item.text: Target player draws four cards.
item.flavorText: Little things like morals shouldn't hinder one's ambition. —Pirate creed

item.name: Opposition
item.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
item.flavorText: Exhausting a wizard can be exhausting work.

item.name: Phantom Warrior
item.text: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
item.flavorText: It can pass through solid matter—but that doesn't mean it's harmless.

item.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
item.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: He wastes his amazing talents on proving how amazing he really is.

item.name: Remove Soul
item.text: Counter target creature spell.

item.name: Sage Owl
item.text: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

item.name: Sea Monster
item.text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
item.flavorText: "Abandon ship"

item.name: Sleight of Hand
item.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
item.flavorText: "Most people believe magic is only a trick. Why change their minds?"

item.name: Steal Artifact
item.text: Enchant artifact You control enchanted artifact.

item.name: Storm Crow
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

item.name: Telepathic Spies
item.text: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.
item.flavorText: Most spies sneak into enemy camps. These spies sneak into enemy minds.

item.name: Telepathy
item.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
item.flavorText: "Secrets? What secrets?"

item.name: Temporal Adept
item.text: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Of course she's at the head of her class. All of her classmates have disappeared." —Tolarian renegade

item.name: Thieving Magpie
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.
item.flavorText: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies steal jewels for theirs.

item.name: Tolarian Winds
item.text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
item.flavorText: Why not ask the winds? —Tolarian expression meaning "Who knows?"

item.name: Treasure Trove
item.text: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Nope, there's nothing here either. You guys go on ahead, I'll catch up in a minute. . . . Whoo hoo"

item.name: Twiddle
item.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

item.name: Unsummon
item.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.name: Vigilant Drake
item.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.
item.flavorText: It can stay aloft for weeks with little or no sleep.

item.name: Vizzerdrix
item.flavorText: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

item.name: Wall of Air
item.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "Let the air itself protect you, for it is everywhere." —Master wizard

item.name: Wall of Wonder
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
item.flavorText: They wondered at the size of it. It wondered which to eat first.

item.name: Wind Dancer
item.text:
Flying
{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The sky is her stage.

item.name: Wind Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "But high she shoots through air and light, Above all low delay, Where nothing earthly bounds her flight, Nor shadow dims her way." —Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

item.name: Abyssal Horror
item.text: Flying When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
item.flavorText: "I dreamt of it once. Now I fear it dreams of me." —Tolarian scholar

item.name: Abyssal Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
item.flavorText: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

item.name: Agonizing Memories
item.text: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.
item.flavorText: "I think little of the foes I've slain. But I'm haunted by the friends I've sent to die." —The Southern Paladin

item.name: Befoul
item.text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: The bog's touch means death to all but the darkest of hearts.

item.name: Bellowing Fiend
item.text:
Flying
Whenever Bellowing Fiend deals damage to a creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.

item.name: Bereavement
item.text: Whenever a green creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, its controller discards a card.
item.flavorText: Grief is a razor that slices the soul.

item.name: Blood Pet
item.text: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: No thrull has ever been burdened with a long life.

item.name: Bog Imp
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

item.name: Bog Wraith
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: The bodies of its victims are the only tracks it leaves.

item.name: Corrupt
item.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

item.name: Crypt Rats
item.text: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana this way.
item.flavorText: Beware anything born among the dead. —Tolarian saying

item.name: Dakmor Lancer
item.text: When Dakmor Lancer enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: The darkness of his shield reflects the inky blackness of his soul.

item.name: Dark Banishing
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Hence ‘banishèd' is banished from the world, / And the world's exile is death." —William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

item.name: Darkest Hour
item.text: All creatures are black.
item.flavorText: The eclipse made it clear whose side the sky was on.

item.name: Dregs of Sorrow
item.text: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.
item.flavorText: "We live for a thousand years. The death of even one brings untold sorrow." —Elvish elder

item.name: Drudge Skeletons
item.text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
item.flavorText: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." —Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

item.name: Duress
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "Change your mind, or I'll change it for you."

item.name: Eastern Paladin
item.text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature.
item.flavorText: "There is no worse enemy. His passion for death doesn't just border on insanity, it wallows in it." —The Southern Paladin

item.name: Engineered Plague
item.text:
As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.
item.flavorText: A single germ can kill more soldiers than ten thousand blades.

item.name: Fallen Angel
item.text: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me." —Fallen angel, to Serra

item.name: Fear
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: "Booga booga booga"

item.name: Foul Imp
item.text: Flying When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.
item.flavorText: The villagers call it "winged stench."

item.name: Fugue
item.text: Target player discards three cards.
item.flavorText: "It's hard to keep our own troops from fleeing when he's like this. How can our foes possibly stand against him?" —Field marshal for the Eastern Paladin

item.name: Giant Cockroach
item.flavorText: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

item.name: Gravedigger
item.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

item.name: Greed
item.text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: An advisor once asked the Western Paladin how much gold would be enough. "I have no need of fools who can imagine ‘enough,'" he told the advisor's corpse.

item.name: Hollow Dogs
item.text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

item.name: Howl from Beyond
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Whether it howls for hunger or for joy, you're in trouble just the same.

item.name: Infernal Contract
item.text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.
item.flavorText: "East and West meet and angels cry. Unholy power darkens the sky." —"The Ballad of the Paladins"

item.name: Leshrac's Rite
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has swampwalk.
item.flavorText: "Brackish water, dark and blind Heed my will, to you I bind." —Opening passage of Leshrac's Rite

item.name: Looming Shade
item.text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

item.name: Megrim
item.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.
item.flavorText: Memories cut from the mind can cut right back.

item.name: Mind Rot
item.text: Target player discards two cards.
item.flavorText: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.

item.name: Nausea
item.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

item.name: Necrologia
item.text: Cast Necrologia only during your end step. As an additional cost to cast Necrologia, pay X life. Draw X cards.

item.name: Nightmare
item.text: Flying Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
item.flavorText: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

item.name: Nocturnal Raid
item.text: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The Eastern Paladin doesn't attack at night for the tactical advantage. He does it for the sheer joy of fighting beneath the moon.

item.name: Oppression
item.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.
item.flavorText: "Defeating an enemy is not nearly as satisfying as watching one suffer." —The Western Paladin

item.name: Ostracize
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "You won't be needing this."

item.name: Persecute
item.text: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of that color.
item.flavorText: "I want every last one of these tree-hugging, earth-loving, pointy-eared weaklings out of here. Now"

item.name: Plague Beetle
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: No one knows whether they were named for the diseases they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

item.name: Rag Man
item.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals his or her hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.
item.flavorText: He hunts what might have been.

item.name: Raise Dead
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

item.name: Razortooth Rats
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: They'll chew through armor, flesh, and bone. They'll even chew through each other if they're hungry enough.

item.name: Reprocess
item.text: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. Draw a card for each permanent sacrificed this way.
item.flavorText: The battle's end is the meal's beginning.

item.name: Revenant
item.text: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
item.flavorText: It eats death and drinks pain.

item.name: Scathe Zombies
item.flavorText: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

item.name: Serpent Warrior
item.text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
item.flavorText: They're the fiercest of all the Western Paladin's soldiers. They're also the most fiercely loyal—but that loyalty comes at a price.

item.name: Soul Feast
item.text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: You are who you eat.

item.name: Spineless Thug
item.text: Spineless Thug can't block.
item.flavorText: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

item.name: Strands of Night
item.text: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: When the strands call, only the dead answer.

item.name: Stronghold Assassin
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.

item.name: Tainted Æther
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature or land.
item.flavorText: Pockets of Æther can be so foul they melt flesh from bone.

item.name: Unholy Strength
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
item.flavorText: "I don't feel any different."

item.name: Wall of Bone
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
item.flavorText: A skeletal wall, strengthened by the souls of traitors, rings the city of the Eastern Paladin.

item.name: Western Paladin
item.text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.
item.flavorText: "Expect nothing but scorn, flattery, and lies. And never turn your back on him." —The Northern Paladin

item.name: Yawgmoth's Edict
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: The warping of bodies and souls has become the heart of Yawgmoth's existence.

item.name: Æther Flash
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, Æther Flash deals 2 damage to it.
item.flavorText: As the foul beast appeared, arcane lightning crackled around it.

item.name: Balduvian Barbarians
item.flavorText: "From the snowy slopes of Kaelor, To the canyons of Bandu, We drink and fight and feast and die As we were born to do." —Balduvian tavern song

item.name: Bedlam
item.text: Creatures can't block.
item.flavorText: The generals were dead. The battle plans were forgotten. It was everyone for themselves.

item.name: Blaze
item.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Fire never dies alone.

item.name: Bloodshot Cyclops
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

item.name: Boil
item.text: Destroy all Islands.
item.flavorText: "It is a slaughter, the death of a sea. Never speak of it again." —The Lord of Atlantis

item.name: Crimson Hellkite
item.text:
Flying
{X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana this way.
item.flavorText: The hellkites are artists with flames, painting the world with fire.

item.name: Disorder
item.text: Disorder deals 2 damage to each white creature and each player who controls a white creature.
item.flavorText: "Fire hurts them almost as much as the chaos that follows. Almost." —The Western Paladin

item.name: Earthquake
item.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

item.name: Fervor
item.text: Creatures you control have haste.
item.flavorText: The intensity of their glare was soon surpassed by the intensity of their attack.

item.name: Final Fortune
item.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.
item.flavorText: A reward is worthless if you aren't around to enjoy it.

item.name: Fire Elemental
item.flavorText: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

item.name: Ghitu Fire-Eater
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: Ghitu Fire-Eater deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: The Ghitu believe their race was born of fire, and it's an honor to return to it.

item.name: Goblin Chariot
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

item.name: Goblin Digging Team
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
item.flavorText: "Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Die" —Goblin chant

item.name: Goblin Elite Infantry
item.text: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: We're elite. You're not. —Infantry motto

item.name: Goblin Gardener
item.text: When Goblin Gardener is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target land.
item.flavorText: Years of attempts have brought the goblins no closer to growing a sausage tree.

item.name: Goblin Glider
item.text: Flying Goblin Glider can't block.
item.flavorText: "What's got two arms, one wing, and no brains?" —Ghitu riddle

item.name: Goblin King
item.text: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
item.flavorText: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok. . . .

item.name: Goblin Matron
item.text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Goblin Raider
item.text: Goblin Raider can't block.
item.flavorText: He's smart for a goblin. He can do two things: hit and run.

item.name: Goblin Spelunkers
item.text: Mountainwalk
item.flavorText: Goblins prefer caves to just about anything else. Caves prefer just about anything else to goblins.

item.name: Goblin War Drums
item.text: Each creature you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
item.flavorText: The goblin idea of music is to hit something with a stick.

item.name: Granite Grip
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.
item.flavorText: "Let me introduce you to Rocky."

item.name: Hill Giant
item.flavorText: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot.

item.name: Impatience
item.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player didn't cast a spell this turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.
item.flavorText: "I'm going to count to three. Three."

item.name: Inferno
item.text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead." —Wandering mage

item.name: Lava Axe
item.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: "Catch"

item.name: Lightning Blast
item.text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "I'll climb down soon. Don't worry, it's just a thundersto—" —Former elvish scout

item.name: Lightning Elemental
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave." —William Knox, "Mortality"

item.name: Mana Clash
item.text: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

item.name: Ogre Taskmaster
item.text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
item.flavorText: Ogres learn how to smash stuff even before they learn how to walk.

item.name: Okk
item.text: Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks. Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.

item.name: Orcish Artillery
item.text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
item.flavorText: "Ready . . . aim . . . fire" "Ow"

item.name: Orcish Oriflamme
item.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

item.name: Pillage
item.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Burn their homes. Salt their lands. Nothing survives." —The Western Paladin

item.name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
item.text:
Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block.
{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Do not judge a lizard by its size. —Ghitu proverb

item.name: Pyroclasm
item.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
item.flavorText: "When the air burns, only death breathes deep." —Bogardan mage

item.name: Pyrotechnics
item.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
item.flavorText: "Who says lightning never strikes twice?" —Storm shaman

item.name: Raging Goblin
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

item.name: Reckless Embermage
item.text: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.
item.flavorText: Those who play with fire are bound to get burned.

item.name: Reflexes
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: "Be as fast as lightning, and you will be just as deadly." —Combat trainer

item.name: Relentless Assault
item.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
item.flavorText: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

item.name: Sabretooth Tiger
item.text: First strike
item.flavorText: "Here, kitty kitty. Here, kitty kitty. Aaaaugh"

item.name: Seismic Assault
item.text: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Earth arms itself with fire.

item.name: Shatter
item.text: Destroy target artifact.

item.name: Shivan Dragon
item.text: Flying {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

item.name: Shock
item.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Spitting Earth
item.text: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.
item.flavorText: "We were ready for an attack from the front, sides, or back—but the mage hit us from below." —Veteran soldier

item.name: Stone Rain
item.text: Destroy target land.

item.name: Storm Shaman
item.text: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: She speaks with the voice of the winds, and the earth trembles.

item.name: Sudden Impact
item.text: Sudden Impact deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
item.flavorText: Caught red-handed.

item.name: Trained Orgg
item.flavorText: "That arm's for bashin'. That one's for smashin'. That one's for scratchin'. And that one . . . I don't know what that one's for." —Orgg trainer

item.name: Tremor
item.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

item.name: Volcanic Hammer
item.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

item.name: Wall of Fire
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The erupting flames work as both barrier and weapon.

item.name: Wildfire
item.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
item.flavorText: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a big appetite.

item.name: Anaconda
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: You'll never find an anaconda in a swamp. It will always find you first.

item.name: Ancient Silverback
item.text: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
item.flavorText: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape—they'd never seen it angry.

item.name: Birds of Paradise
item.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

item.name: Blanchwood Armor
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.
item.flavorText: "There's never been a dwarven smith who could match the marvels that Gaea herself forges." —The Elvish Champion

item.name: Bull Hippo
item.text: Islandwalk
item.flavorText: The merfolk may rule the waters, but hippos have never had much respect for authority.

item.name: Canopy Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

item.name: Compost
item.text: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout. —Yavimaya saying

item.name: Creeping Mold
item.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
item.flavorText: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

item.name: Early Harvest
item.text: Target player untaps all basic lands he or she controls.
item.flavorText: "Give it a week and it will feed an army."

item.name: Elder Druid
item.text: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
item.flavorText: "I may seem wise to you, but I'm merely a sapling among mighty oaks."

item.name: Elvish Archers
item.text: First strike
item.flavorText: The archers have a reputation for attacking without warning. They claim that the first arrow is the warning.

item.name: Elvish Champion
item.text: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
item.flavorText: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." —Elvish hymn

item.name: Elvish Lyrist
item.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
item.flavorText: To an elf, magic and music are the same.

item.name: Elvish Piper
item.text: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. —Elvish teaching

item.name: Familiar Ground
item.text: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.
item.flavorText: More than any other battlefield, the forest gives the advantage to those who know it best.

item.name: Femeref Archers
item.text: {T}: Femeref Archers deals 4 damage to target attacking creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "Bet you can't put it through the eye." "Left or right?"

item.name: Fog
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

item.name: Fyndhorn Elder
item.text: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "It is useful to be able to speak to the trees. But it is truly wondrous to be able to listen to them."

item.name: Gang of Elk
item.text: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
item.flavorText: "I felt the ground shake, so I hid in my tent until the earthquake passed. It passed all right, and it left hoofprints." —Femeref explorer

item.name: Giant Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Giant Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Watching the spider's web —Llanowar expression meaning "focusing on the wrong thing"

item.name: Gorilla Chieftain
item.text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
item.flavorText: A gorilla chief must always be prepared to defend his crown. This leads to some pretty tough apes.

item.name: Grizzly Bears
item.flavorText: They've got claws as long as your arm. And they're grouchy. Really, really grouchy.

item.name: Hurricane
item.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

item.name: Llanowar Elves
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Llanowar covers a million square miles, yet nobody enters the forest without the elves knowing it.

item.name: Lone Wolf
item.text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
item.flavorText: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

item.name: Lure
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
item.flavorText: "When the forest wants something, no mortal mind can resist her." —Maro

item.name: Maro
item.text: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: No two see the same Maro.

item.name: Might of Oaks
item.text: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Guess where I'm gonna plant this"

item.name: Monstrous Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Get in touch with your inner monster.

item.name: Nature's Resurgence
item.text: Each player draws a card for each creature card in his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "The dead whisper to the living. If you listen, you will learn." —Maro

item.name: Nature's Revolt
item.text: All lands are 2/2 creatures that are still lands.
item.flavorText: The land rises up to defend against those who would spoil its beauty.

item.name: Pride of Lions
item.text: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
item.flavorText: There's only one thing worse than a hungry lion—many hungry lions.

item.name: Rampant Growth
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

item.name: Reclaim
item.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
item.flavorText: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

item.name: Redwood Treefolk
item.flavorText: And would you strip the bark from a treefolk? —Elvish expression meaning "Are you crazy?"

item.name: Regeneration
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
item.flavorText: "Why should death always have the last word?" —Llanowar druid

item.name: Rowen
item.text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.
item.flavorText: Those who understand the forest are free to harvest its bounty.

item.name: Scavenger Folk
item.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: "One piece? Now there's a hundred"

item.name: Seeker of Skybreak
item.text: {T}: Untap target creature.
item.flavorText: Seekers spend their lives protecting a home they rarely visit.

item.name: Shanodin Dryads
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: Where dryads dance, seeds sprout and flowers bloom.

item.name: Spined Wurm
item.flavorText: "I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan" —Wandering mage

item.name: Squall
item.text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "May the winds blow till they have wakened death. . . ." —William Shakespeare, Othello

item.name: Stream of Life
item.text: Target player gains X life.

item.name: Thorn Elemental
item.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
item.flavorText: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

item.name: Thoughtleech
item.text: Whenever an Island an opponent controls becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "Their thoughts flow through my mind, and I am healed." —Fyndhorn elder

item.name: Trained Armodon
item.flavorText: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

item.name: Tranquility
item.text: Destroy all enchantments.

item.name: Treefolk Seedlings
item.text: Treefolk Seedlings's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.
item.flavorText: Even the grandest forest begins with a single seedling. —Llanowar saying

item.name: Uktabi Wildcats
item.text: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

item.name: Untamed Wilds
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: No forest is so remote that the elves don't know its secrets.

item.name: Verduran Enchantress
item.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: Each spell has its own song, and the enchantress knows the dance for each.

item.name: Vernal Bloom
item.text: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
item.flavorText: Spring breathes the magic of new life.

item.name: Wild Growth
item.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
item.flavorText: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.

item.name: Wing Snare
item.text: Destroy target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: The elves long ago mastered the art of hunting with nets. They call it "fishing the sky."

item.name: Wood Elves
item.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

item.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
item.text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

item.name: Aladdin's Ring
item.text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Some say Aladdin's third wish was for this ring.

item.name: Beast of Burden
item.text: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The heavier the load, the harder it works.

item.name: Caltrops
item.text: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.
item.flavorText: The Eastern Paladin knew how highly his southern rival valued horses, so he gleefully prepared a suitable welcome.

item.name: Charcoal Diamond
item.text: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Coat of Arms
item.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

item.name: Crystal Rod
item.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Polished by a thousand waves.

item.name: Dingus Egg
item.text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
item.flavorText: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.

item.name: Disrupting Scepter
item.text: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

item.name: Ensnaring Bridge
item.text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
item.flavorText: Bridges usually get you from one place to another. This one just gets you.

item.name: Feroz's Ban
item.text: Creature spells cost {2} more to cast.
item.flavorText: Feroz is gone, but what remains is his final gift to his people: the right to be left alone.

item.name: Fire Diamond
item.text: Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Flying Carpet
item.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Wheeeeeeeeeeeeeee"

item.name: Grafted Skullcap
item.text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.
item.flavorText: "Every day, I fight for my life and win. Every night, I fight to remember my name and lose."

item.name: Grapeshot Catapult
item.text: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: The Southern Paladin taught the airborne vermin to fear the storm that rains upward.

item.name: Howling Mine
item.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
item.flavorText: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

item.name: Iron Star
item.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Forged by a thousand flames.

item.name: Ivory Cup
item.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Blessed by a thousand prayers.

item.name: Jalum Tome
item.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
item.flavorText: Most books simply deliver knowledge. This one expects some in return.

item.name: Jandor's Saddlebags
item.text: {3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
item.flavorText: Your heart's desire is found within. —Saddlebag inscription

item.name: Jayemdae Tome
item.text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Knowledge is power." —Sir Francis Bacon, Meditationes Sacrae

item.name: Marble Diamond
item.text: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Meekstone
item.text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
item.flavorText: The bigger they are, the stronger its pull.

item.name: Millstone
item.text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

item.name: Moss Diamond
item.text: Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Patagia Golem
item.text: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.

item.name: Phyrexian Colossus
item.text: Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step. Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus. Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

item.name: Phyrexian Hulk
item.flavorText: It doesn't think. It doesn't feel. It doesn't laugh or cry. All it does from dusk till dawn Is make the soldiers die. —Onean children's rhyme

item.name: Pit Trap
item.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pit Trap: Destroy target attacking creature without flying. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: Never forget your feet —Elvish expression meaning "watch your step"

item.name: Rod of Ruin
item.text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

item.name: Sisay's Ring
item.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "I'm not one for pretty things," said Sisay. "Unless they're pretty useful as well."

item.name: Sky Diamond
item.text: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Soul Net
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

item.name: Spellbook
item.text: You have no maximum hand size.
item.flavorText: Knowledge knows no bounds.

item.name: Static Orb
item.text: If Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.
item.flavorText: The warriors fought against the paralyzing waves until even their thoughts froze in place.

item.name: Storm Cauldron
item.text: Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns. Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

item.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
item.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.

item.name: Throne of Bone
item.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Tainted by a thousand fears.

item.name: Wall of Spears
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike
item.flavorText: "A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend." —Onean sergeant

item.name: Wooden Sphere
item.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Strengthened by a thousand limbs.

item.name: Adarkar Wastes
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Brushland
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: City of Brass
item.text: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

item.text: G

item.name: Karplusan Forest
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

item.text: R

item.name: Sulfurous Springs
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

item.text: B

item.text: B

item.name: Underground River
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.
